All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArmorBase
A class for modeling armor objects to be used by the player
Attackable
Interface for implementing attack
AttackGem
Class for modeling AttackGems
Breakable
Interface to destroy objects.
Breastplate
A class for modeling chest armor objects to be used by the player
Chest
Interface for armor items belonging to the chest slot.
Consumable
Interface for consuming items
Dagger
A class for modeling Daggers for player use
DefenseGem
Class for modeling DefenseGems.
Defensive
Interface enabling defense
Enemy
Class for modeling enemy objects.
Equipment
A class to 'hold' the equipment that the player is currently using.
Equippable
Interface for items to be bound in Equipment array
Feet
Interface for armor items belonging to the feet slot.
Gem
Abstract class for modeling gem types.
Hand
Interface for armor items belonging to the hand slot.
Head
Interface for armor items belonging to the head slot.
Helmet
A class for modeling helmet objects to be used by the player
Item
Parent class for equippable items.
ItemBase
A class for modeling generic inventory items.
LegGuard
A class for modeling leg armor objects to be used by the player
Legs
Interface for armor items belonging to the legs slot.
Main
 
Mineable
Interface to enable mining of an object
Offhand
Interface for armor items belonging to the Offhand slot.
Ore
A class to model mineable ore objects
Player
A class for modeling the player object.
Potion
Class for modeling potions for player use.
Repairable
Interface enabling repair of an object
Sabatons
A class for modeling foot armor objects to be used by the player
Shield
A class for modeling Shield and offhand objects to be used by the player
Stackable
Interface enabling stacking of an object
StackableItem
Class for modeling stackable items in player inventory.
Upgradeable
Interface enabling upgrade of an object
WeaponBase
Class for modeling weapon items for player use.
